result.execSummary:
The defendant Alejandro Fuentes was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: The defendant shall pay Department of Correction fees as directed by the agent.  Defendant was ordered to report immediately to the probation and parole office.

miscConds.notes: Bond previously posted of $150.00 applied remaining costs to be paid on a schedule established by the agent.  Defendant is ordered to pay the DNA surcharge, and to make arrangements to provide a DNA sample, within 48 hours, for testing through the Clark County Sheriff Department or if on probation, to the Department of Corrections as is required in all criminal convictions.
Defendant shall attend counseling, treatments, programming, evaluations as deemed appropriate by the agent releasing all records to the agent upon request
Defendant is specifically allowed contact with T.F. as long as no new basis arises for the agent to restrict contact.
The defendant is to submit to an Alcohol and Other Drug Assessment (AODA) and follow the recommendations, releasing the findings to the agent.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alejandro Fuentes

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Prosecutor Kerra Stumbris and Defendant, Alejandro Fuentes appeared, pro se, Agreement reached  Defendant finalized  waiver of  right to an attorney after full colloquy.
ADA Kerra Stumbris appeared for the State and Defendant, Alejandro Fuentes appeared, pro se  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 25, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Pre-trial conference at 01-12-2016 10:30 am.
Status conference at 01-21-2016 01:50 pm.

Prosecutor Kerra Stumbris and Defendant, Alejandro Fuentes appeared, pro se  Defendant was advised of right to attorney and waived that right  at this time.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 12, 2016 at 10:30 am.  Status conference scheduled for January 21, 2016 at 01:50 pm.

Prosecutor Kerra Stumbris and Defendant, Alejandro Fuentes appeared, pro se  Defendant will seek an attorney,  Court admonished defendant to obtain counsel or the right to counsel may be forfeited. request additional time. Request bond modification, to allow contact.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for December 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation

The defendant shall have no contact with  T.F. of any kind, whether direct or indirect, including in person, in writing, by phone, by e-mail or other electronic means, through a third party or in any other way.  Defendant may go through a third party no more than three times a week for financial issues or child visitation/placement
AMENDED 11-05-2015 NO CONTACT PROVISION IS DROPPED AND MODIFIED TO NO VIOLENT OR OTHERWISE DISORDERLY CONTACT WITH T.F.
Prosecutor Kerra Stumbris and Defendant, Alejandro Fuentes appeared, pro se.  Defendant advised of right to an attorney  Initial appearance scheduled for November 5, 2015 at 09:40 am.
